org.monte.media.mpo
Class MPOImageReader

java.lang.Object
  javax.imageio.ImageReader
      org.monte.media.mpo.MPOImageReader

public class MPOImageReader
extends javax.imageio.ImageReader

Reads an image in the MultiPicture Object format (MPO).

See: MPO Format Specification.

Version:
1.1 2011-02-01 Improves performance of method getImageMetadata.
1.0 2009-12-14 Created.
Author:
Werner Randelshofer
